page.title: 03POLICEMAN,EMPLOYMENT SURVEY
page.content: {THE DISTINGTON POLICEMAN Distington policeman P.C.Franklin has been in the police force for six years.He enjoys his job because he has different activities each day.Once he had been to a riot in Liverpool. Another day he had been to an accident in Whitehaven.He is the only policeman in Distington.He says theft is the most common crime in Distington. {EMPLOYMENT SURVEY DISTINGTON VILLAGE NAME OF PLACE NUMBER EMPLOYED Grant's Grocers shop 5 Greggain's Fruit shop 2 Tinnion Bric-a-brac 1 Supersava Supermarket 10 Gates Tyres-Garage 11 Myers and Bowmans Garage 55 Post Office 1 Elecrical Shop 1 Unemployment for the area is 13.4% 1985 National average figure is 13.2%
